{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.11068v1", "title": "Uma extensão de Raft com propagação epidémica", "summary": "The Raft agreement algorithm is recognized for its ease of understanding and
practical implementation, and is currently adopted in systems such as
Kubernetes. However, it has some limitations in terms of scalability and
performance as it concentrates effort on the leader. In this paper we present a
new algorithm that expands Raft by incorporating epidemic propagation
mechanisms to decentralize the replication effort. Our proposal is evaluated
experimentally with a Go implementation and tested with a significant number of
processes. -- --

trabalho apresentamos um novo algoritmo que expande o Raft com a
incorpora\c{c}\~ao de mecanismos de propaga\c{c}\~ao epid\'emica para
descentralizar o esfor\c{c}o da replica\c{c}\~ao. A nossa proposta \'e avaliada
experimentalmente com uma implementa\c{c}\~ao em Go e testada com um n\'umero
